programme.desc: Gil and his family are living an idyllic existence until an accident changes everything. Just as Gill seems to have moved on, someone close hatches a deadly plot.

programme.title: American Monster
programme.desc: After years of searching for love, Doris thinks shes finally hit the jackpot with an old friend named Mark. But something dark is taking hold of their marriage.

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: An ex-marine leaves home to report for drills with the National Guard but never arrives. Detectives follow his trail into the heart of the Montana forests - but where is Noah?

programme.title: Disappeared
programme.desc: Clinton has a heart condition, is worried about a narcotics charge, and is unsure if hes about to be a dad when he disappears. Has he run away - or come to harm?

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: Two young women who dream of big success as television anchors are just embarking on their careers when their plans come to a violent end. What happened to them?

programme.title: Still A Mystery
programme.desc: A 19-year-old goes missing after going to a party. The discovery of her remains in a field 15 months later is devastating - who would do this to her?

programme.title: The Dead Files
programme.desc: A restaurant owner is convinced that evil spirits are out to ruin her business. Steve and Amy visit South Carolina to stop the dead from overrunning her life.

programme.title: Ghost Nation
programme.desc: The team investigate reports of electrical anomalies, shadow figures and disembodied voices at a former prison. Will they uncover answers for its new owners?

programme.title: Destination Fear
programme.desc: The team learns the true meaning of school spirit at a vacant school. From a ghostly janitors lair to a freaky encounter, the crew are haunted non-stop.
